 üí∏ –ó–ø –æ—Ç 150 000 net 

–ù–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏:
üî∏Software development experience 5+, 
üî∏Experience with Django (Django ORM, Django Rest Framework (1+years);
üî∏Experience with AWS services: Lambda, API Gateway, SNS, SQS, SES, S3, RDS, VPC, EC2, CloudWatch, etc.
üî∏Experience writing API and working / integration with API of third-party services;
üî∏Knowledge of the GraphQL API (Graphene will be a plus)
üî∏Knowledge of SQL (PostgreSQL relational DBMS will be a plus)
üî∏Knowledge of CloudFormation in AWS and Terraform;
üî∏Ability to read code and understand it at the level of business logic;
üî∏Ability to work with general abstract tasks;
üî∏Written and spoken English is a MUST (B2+)
